context_bundle.summary: Go web development with net/http, Chi router, Gin framework, middleware patterns, and RESTful API design

onboarding.quick_start: go get -u github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 && go run main.go
common_patterns: Basic server: 'http.HandleFunc("/", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { fmt.Fprintf(w, "Hello") }); http.ListenAndServe(":8080", nil)'
Chi router: 'r := chi.NewRouter(); r.Use(middleware.Logger); r.Get("/users/{id}", getUser); http.ListenAndServe(":8080", r)'
Middleware: 'func loggingMiddleware(next http.Handler) http.Handler { return http.HandlerFunc(func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { log.Println(r.URL); next.ServeHTTP(w, r) }) }'
Request parsing: 'var user User; if err := json.NewDecoder(r.Body).Decode(&user); err != nil { http.Error(w, err.Error(), 400) }'
Context values: 'ctx := context.WithValue(r.Context(), "user", user); r = r.WithContext(ctx)'
known_errors: address already in use: Change port or kill process with 'lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill'
broken pipe: Client disconnected, handle context cancellation
request timeout: Increase server timeouts 'ReadTimeout: 15 * time.Second, WriteTimeout: 15 * time.Second'
middleware not executing: Check middleware order, ensure Use() before routes
CORS error: Add proper CORS headers or use cors middleware
panic in handler: Use recovery middleware to catch panics
